effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.
